answers.answer: 2/3 of women pass the 3 hour glucose test street failing the one hour. Dont worry so much.
Oh god, I hope so! Thank you for the response!
I think you will pass.  :-) i made the mistake of having a bowl of pops cereal lol so i failed my first test like you did but passed with flying colors the second time.

I sure hope so! I mean, I barely failed so I'm keeping my fingers crossed.  I'm trying to decide if I should wait until after my baby shower to retest. Theres gonna be such yummy food I can't pass up. Everyone is cooking for me..it would be rude not to eat it ;)

When I went to my doctors last Friday she made me take the test but I wasn't prepared to take it. I was just suppose to go in for a regular check up & talk to my nutrician so  I had a big breakfast lol I didn't know about the fasting until I came home & read other post on glucose test. I think I failed so I'll have to do the 3hrs test. I go back next Friday. I'm not too worried tho even if I failed the 1hr test I think I'll past the 3hrs since I know now that I have to fast lol
Hopefully we both pass!Even if I fail it...I'll be ok. Sugar isn't healthy for the baby anyways.  It's gonna be hard cutting out the good stuff but it's only temporary lol
I know right. The weird thing is before I wasn't eating much sugary foods but now that I'm actually trying to not eat them I'm craving them more.
Lol same here. My daughter is giving me the biggest sweet tooth. I'll keep my fingers crossed for both of us lol

question: So I took my 1 hour glucose test and failed by 8 points.  My question is, how likely is it to pass the 3 hour one and not have gestational diabetes? I'm just stressing out now :/
title: 3 hour glucose test?
